meta.title: Quartermasters — Strategic Consulting & Advisory
meta.description: Premium consulting across six verticals: Financial Advisory, Human Capital, Technology & Innovation, Events & Experiences, IT Services, and Strategic Management.

hero.headline: Your Strategic Advantage Starts Here
hero.subheadline: Six verticals. One mission. Accelerating your growth with precision consulting from California to the world.

services.title: Our Service Verticals
services.subtitle: Six specialized practices. One unified strategy.

financial_advisory.name: Financial Advisory
financial_advisory.description: Banking services consultancy, regulatory compliance, investment strategy, and financial restructuring for organizations seeking fiscal excellence.

human_capital.name: Human Capital
human_capital.description: HR consultancy, talent strategy, organizational design, and workforce planning to build high-performing teams.

management.name: Strategic Management
management.description: Management consultancy, operational excellence, growth strategy, and business transformation for ambitious organizations.

tech_rnd.name: Technology & R&D
tech_rnd.description: Consulting and R&D in technology education, digital transformation, emerging tech strategy, and innovation programs.

event_logistics.name: Events & Experiences
event_logistics.description: Organization and event management, logistics, venue strategy, and experience design for impactful corporate events.

it_services.name: IT Services
it_services.description: Software development, web applications, SaaS platforms, cloud architecture, and technical implementation services.

chat.title: Q
chat.subtitle: Senior Strategy Consultant
chat.placeholder: Ask about our services, pricing, or methodology...
chat.empty_state: Engage Quartermasters intelligence. Ask about our 6 service verticals, pricing, or methodology.

booking.title: Book a Consultation
booking.subtitle: Schedule a call with our strategy team
booking.discovery_desc: 15-minute introductory call to understand your needs
booking.express_desc: 15-minute focused session on a specific question

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's start a conversation about your strategic needs
contact.name: Full Name
contact.success: Message sent successfully. We'll be in touch shortly.
contact.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.

footer.tagline: Strategic consulting from California to the world.

cookie_banner.ccpa_title: Do Not Sell My Personal Information
cookie_banner.gdpr_body: We respect your data privacy. You must opt-in to non-essential cookies.
cookie_banner.ccpa_body: Under California law, you have the right to opt-out of the sale of your personal information.
cookie_banner.default_body: We use cookies to analyze traffic and enhance your experience.
cookie_banner.analytics_desc: Anonymous usage data to improve UX.
